item.title: Solving a cryptographic challenge in Rust
item.description: Howdy Thought I’d kick things off by setting the tone for the rest of this blog. The front page description won’t do it justice as time passes and this nerdy diary of artless prose fills to the brim. Getting closer to the point This isn’t to say that the blog is purely tech-based or security-related. Indeed it will be a recurring theme, largely due to how much less effort it takes to type stuff (code) and then type some more (this blog) to discuss said stuff.
